definition: unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
(negative prefix)/not/no

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group

sentences.english: Nick: Excuse me. Do you know Xie Lei? I'm his friend from America.
sentences.chinese: 對不起。你認識謝磊嗎？我是他美國的朋友。

sentences.english: Sorry. I've no idea about it.
Sorry, it's our house phone, not for outside line.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，這是工作電話，不外借。

sentences.english: More folks are killed by dwi than guns.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，比起槍擊更多的人可是死於醉駕的。

sentences.english: Sorry, we are all booked up (fully booked, full) tonight.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，今晚的房間已被定滿。

sentences.english: C. Sorry , I don"t know Pleaseask the policeman over there."
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我不知道，請問那邊的警察。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, we have no record of a reservation in your name.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，沒有以您的名字預定的餐位。

sentences.english: Sorry. Mr. Green can't see you now.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，格林師長教師此刻不能見您。

sentences.english: You think that by saying I'm sorry all the past can be corrected.
sentences.chinese: 你以爲說聲對不起，過去的一切就能改過來嗎？

sentences.english: A: Sorry. I broke your radio.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我把你的收音機弄壞了。

sentences.english: I am sorry, you haven't reconfirmed your seat.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，您還沒有確認您的座位。

sentences.english: Sorry, Idon't [take] his telephone numbers [with] me.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我沒有帶他的電話號碼。

sentences.english: Sorry. It's 3:30 p. m. , our tickets sale is over.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，現在是下午三點半，我們的售票已結束。

sentences.english: Excuse me, I hear a litte ask you direct for me left or right?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我聽不懂，請您詳細指給我怎麼走好嗎？

sentences.english: Sorry , I think I'll sit out the next dance .
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我想坐會兒，等過了下個舞再跳。

sentences.english: "Newly married but soon, the husband made a sorry cuckoldry matter.
sentences.chinese: 可是新婚不久，丈夫就作出了對不起妻子的事。

to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
should not/to owe nothing
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
as for/when it comes to
this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
actually/in fact/really
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
not bad/tolerable/fortunately
incorrect/wrong/amiss/abnormal/queer
to scold/to abuse/to curse/CL:通[tong4],頓|顿[dun4]
